= Integrating Pinax Blog =

== Installation ==

1. download a tarball of pinax here:

http://github.com/pinax/pinax/tree/master

extract archive into a folder

cd into the /pinax/apps directory

copy the blog directory into /newsroom/apps

2. download threadedcomments from here:

http://github.com/ericflo/django-threadedcomments/tree/master

3. download notification from here:

http://github.com/pinax/django-notification/tree/master

copy the threadedcomments directory and the notification into the newsroom/apps folder

4. Install django-pagination:

{{{
svn checkout http://django-pagination.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ django-pagination-read-only
}}}

move the django-pagination folder into newsroom/apps

5. Install django-template-utils into the virtual-env's django instance as described here:

http://code.google.com/p/django-template-utils/

6) Move tag_app directory from pinax/projects/social_project/apps into newsroom/apps

7) Install Markup

Markup and Inlines requires Markdown be installed. To do this, run the following commands from within your virtual env:
{{{
easy_install ElementTree
easy_install Markdown
}}}
For more info, see: http://www.djangoproject.com/documentation/add_ons/#markup 

8) Copy base.html to site_base.html

9) add to settings.py INSTALLED_APPS:
{{{
    'blog',
    'threadedcomments',
    'notification',
    'tag-app',
    'django-pagination',
    'django.contrib.markup',
}}}
run:
{{{
./manage.py reset blog
./manage.py syncdb
}}}

Add edit/blog entries here:

http://localhost:8000/admin/blog/

View them here:

Go to http://localhost:8000/blog
